title: Ear Training for Beginners
description: Learn the fundamentals of ear training.

lessons.title: Halftones and Wholetones
lessons.notes: Before we can talk about intervals, you need to understand what an half tones and whole tones are.

lessons.title: What are Intervals?
lessons.notes: Now we can talk about intervals.

lessons.title: Which Intervals are there?
lessons.notes: There are 12 intervals in an octave.

lessons.title: More About Augmented and Diminished Intervals
lessons.notes: Learn how to play the major scale on guitar.
